messages.content: You will be provided with a text, and your task is to extract the airport codes from it.
What are all of the airports in London?

message.content: There are several airports in London. The main ones are London Heathrow Airport (LHR), London Gatwick Airport (LGW), London Stansted Airport (STN), London Luton Airport (LTN), and London City Airport (LCY).
